creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: teapot (a) with lid (b); flattened edges on side of teapot; ridge in center of handle; dark, mottled and speckled glazing that transitions into smooth tan glazing towards bottom; sits on four feet squarish feet; lid is circular with peaked knob at center
markings: maker\'s stamp impression on side of body below handle, near foot: JO
medium: Stoneware, wood-fired, thrown and altered, ash glaze
title: Teapot
